item.description:
I think all those in attendance will agree that the Cat Empire put on a cracking show the other night at the Paradise Club. To keep the vibe flowing we've lined up another session of live Aussie music. Xavier Rudd is an Australian multi-instrumentalist who has developed a strong following around the summer music festival circuit in Australia over the last few years. This would be a good one for anyone into the roots sound, especially artists like John Bulter and Jack Johnson. The Paradise Club is a great venue for live music: multi-level club, good sound system, plenty of space to listen intently or have a wiggle and no shortage of refreshment points.

Doors open at 7pm, show starts at 8pm, tickets are $16.50 and can be bought online from the club website or at the door.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Live Aussie music: Xavier Rudd @ Paradise Club
